name: con1

comment: Contraposition. Theorem *2.15 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 102. Its associated inference is ~ con1i . (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-Feb-2013.)
